concept.title: Kafka Producer
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka Producer writes data to a Kafka cluster. The Kakfa Producer can write data to Kafka as delimited, text, or JSON data. You can also use the Kafka Producer to write data using the SDC records format.

conbody.p: Kafka Producer destinationoverviewdestinationsKafka ProducerWhen you configure a Kafka Producer, you configure the brokers, topic, partition strategy, and data format to use. You can add additional Kafka configuration properties as needed.
The Kafka Producer passes data to partitions in the Kafka topic based on the partition strategy that you choose.
